name: After School Dungeon Club - 放課後迷宮部
name_original: After School Dungeon Club - 放課後迷宮部
description:
CHANGELOG

V1.1

- The portal Maura is checking out now activates upon finishing up with her events, so you can reach the end of the game

V1.0A

- Fixed a remnant of the previous iteration of a difficulty selection system which ended up being too cruel to include, but was unintentionally activating during the casual/normal mode selection for those who would pick normal mode.

V1.0

- Added difficulty setting which really just lets you decide if you want to be able to see a map view of your immediate area, or not (can only be selected at the start of the game)

- Added a useful spell for sale to Claude's selection since apparently I totally forgot to add it anywhere else in the game

- Added Claude help dialogue with some hints and stuff

- A certain girl in a red hat now appears as intended towards the end of the game

V.9

- INITIAL RELEASE

NOTICE: Thank you for noticing.

Not gonna lie - this COULD be buggy as hell. I did not do any sort of final playtest for the sake of making the cutoff for the jam deadline, so there may potentially be

-balancing issues

-bugs

-etc

SPECIAL NOTICE

This game was created using RM2k3 MANIACS. Do not attempt to play this game in EasyRPG player as it will not play correctly.

THANK YOU BASED SQUARESOFT

I love your font and adapted the SNES tier Final Fantasy/etc font to work with the limited pixel width for RPG Maker. Sorry if anyone hates it.

SPECIAL THANKS/INSPIRATION

-Morisoba (Cirnozardry creator)

-The guy who created ろすだむ！

As I largely based/expanded upon the basic principles of those titles in order to make this possible. The graphics are modified Wizardry/Cirnozardry graphics outright, but the way the dungeon is drawn and presented differs as many quality of life changes/etc were added as well as vast improvements to how the dungeon is rendered, the viewing distance for doors and events, as well as other changes.

MUSIC CREDITS

- 99% Dova Syndrome music

- 1% some song I got from 創造のメモリア

SFX

- VIPRPG sozai collection (can't remember which one)

GUEST APPEARANCE

- Maura (Shoukanshi/Majo, but a lot less gaki than before)

FACES

- 100% Artflow Ai generated images except for ones that were obviously photoshopped to all hell
